price: Afei wͻ’nwie wͻn (Nyamesom) amaneε no, na wͻni wͻn bͻhyε so, na wͻntwa Tete Fie dadaa (Ka’ba) no ho nhyia.
arabic: ثُمَّ لۡيَقۡضُواْ تَفَثَهُمۡ وَلۡيُوفُواْ نُذُورَهُمۡ وَلۡيَطَّوَّفُواْ بِٱلۡبَيۡتِ ٱلۡعَتِيقِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: thumma l'yaqḍū tafathahum walyūfū nudhūrahum walyaṭṭawwafū bil-bayti al-ʿatīqi
